  • Constructor Details

    • BrowserLocalBackedKVStore

      public BrowserLocalBackedKVStore(Channel componentChannel, String consolePrefix)
      Create a new key/value store that uses the browser’s local storage for persisting the values.
      Parameters:
      componentChannel - the channel that the component’s handlers listen on by default and that Manager.fire(Event, Channel...) sends the event to
      consolePrefix - the web console’s prefix as returned by ConsoleWeblet.prefix(), i.e. staring and ending with a slash
